In Europe, football, otherwise known as soccer, it the most popular sport by several orders of magnitude, whereas in America, fandom is fairly evenly __________ among a few different sports.
Blank (i)
(A) regarded
(B) inspired
(C) enjoyed
(D) measured
(E) apportioned
